website_summaries.verdict: With a nail-biting, political thriller–like campaign set on the battlefields of the 1960s, and a wide range of online and unlockable content, Call of Duty: Black Ops offers a host of captivating ways to get your war on.
cons: Online multiplayer version lacks cooperative mode

customer_reviews.title: ... other Call of Duty games on Steam and really liked them. Wold at War
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered and played a bunch of other Call of Duty games on Steam and really liked them. Wold at War, Modern Warfare 1 & 2, and a couple of the originals. This one can't seem to run for long without crashing. It's frustrating because I'll get to a point in the game, it crashes, then have to start all over. Not sure if I'll be able to make it through the whole campaign since I'll probably just get too frustrated and quit playing it.
customer_reviews.author: Fitness Queen

customer_reviews.title: Updates have made this game good
customer_reviews.text: After seeing many negative reviews on this game, I have to say that this game is a lot of fun to play on pc today. There are not as many servers as there used to be, but you can still get into some consistent TDM servers (and other game modes if you play hardcore/crouch). I found that the stutter that many people complained about in the past to be nonexistent when I play and I would say that the game is pretty decent today. You can still get into a zombie match with only a couple minutes of wait and the campaign is stable.
customer_reviews.author: Will Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Hunting Zombies since......
customer_reviews.text: This item cannot be activated on Steam.com Also good luck looking for all of the patches needed to run Custom Zombies. On a positive note: this game will run on non gaming laptops provided you have the minimum requirements. But the custom zombie maps might need extra GB in the right places. Ram, graphics, Hard Drive. Also if your disc is damaged well. Order from steam.
customer_reviews.author: Haiger

customer_reviews.title: controller support was terrible and other add-ons that offered support was not better
customer_reviews.text: controller support was terrible and other add-ons that offered support was not better. support seemed to be made to lag keyboard and mouse. all call of duty games are worth revisiting and could generate massive sales if they would go back and add the support. if it was offered on the xbox, which means the support is there due to use of a striped version of windows being also used it would be to easy. the developers obviouse to not want the sales, or benefit those who play.
customer_reviews.author: Megan p

customer_reviews.title: Still relevant after 6 years!
customer_reviews.text: Super fun game, plenty of people still play it online- multiplayer as well as zombies. For the dlc, though, you'll probably have to find people to play it with, which shouldn't be too hard if you look on the Steam forums. Just buy it and enter the download code they give you on Steam. By the way, it works just fine on Windows 10, and you can look on systemrequirementslab.com to see if your computer can play it.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: This game is the best in the series since CoD 4
customer_reviews.text: DEDICATED SERVERS DEDICATED SERVERS DEDICATED SERVERS !! Finally, the series gets dedicated servers again. Hallelujah! A new take on CoD, this has my favorite story so far. Set in the 80s world of espionage and secret missions there are a lot of fun new guns to play around with and interesting places to make your playground. Lock & Load; there's a lot of fun to be had with this one!
customer_reviews.author: VortextuaL

customer_reviews.title: Classic game at the time!
customer_reviews.text: Fun game when it came out. Single player is a little short but quite engaging. Multiplayer is a little hectic but aren't all FPS games like that? Can get many hours of enjoyment from this game!
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: ONE OF THE BEST
customer_reviews.text: I love Black Ops 1. It was my first CoD, and I just LOVE the campaign, (well, because it has my favorite president in it,) and love the zombies and multiplayer. When this game first came out, it was a major success for Activision. And as always, I just LOVE the storyline of each and every campaign EVER.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Ripoff Sans Refund
customer_reviews.text: Call of Duty is a great game so my son wanted a PC version as well as PS3. This download installation set up and execution must have been designed by Rube Goldberg or a 9 year old - can't tell which. Cross media installation set-up along with requirement to use Steam.com as the proxy launcher. Ridiculous set-up procedures. It's like traveling back in time to 1998. THERE IS NO REFUND FOR DOWNLOADED MEDIA - Recommendation for this product from this download provider: DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: JB5

customer_reviews.title: Not great at all
customer_reviews.text: I got a copy of the game and i was excited to play on my computer until it told me that someone already activated the code so I literally cannot play the game so I have nothing else to do but to return it DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT it wasn't even worth it I'm just now disappointed with the fact that I can't do anything to fix this.
customer_reviews.author: Ismael

customer_reviews.title: game wouldn't play
customer_reviews.text: I love the game, which i play on my xbox 360. I wanted to try it on my pc so I bought it and downloaded it. But I couldn't get it to play. I googled different way to make it work, and I tried all of them, but the game still wouldn't load or play. Through all of my google searches, I read a lot of reviews about the pc version of black ops not working, and I learned that I wasn't the only one having this problem. I ended up having to get a refund for the game unfortunately, which I was given with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: leslieD

customer_reviews.title: Crashes and freezes often....
customer_reviews.text: I have had this game since Christmas and I really enjoy it. A lot of content, a good storyline, awesome online multi-player, and zombies. The bad side is the freezing and crashing. I play around 3 hours every day and the game probably crashes six or seven times during my time playing it during the day. It's not a connection issue, I think its just bad programming. It's easy to get right back into the game, but its very annoying. I don't worry about it because Treyarch will probably come out with a patch sometime soon. Good game, crashing needs to be fixed by Treyarch with a patch. Very good otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Diane L. Frantz

customer_reviews.title: What problems?
customer_reviews.text: i dont know why people are having so much trouble but one make 100% your Pc will run this game try uninstalling and reinstalling the game if you have problems if you have a lot of lag it probably means you have bad internet connection or slow PC so try some of those`s things dont buy the disk buy the download its working fine on my desktop and laptop i have nivdia geforce 8600 gt 2.5 GHz i 5 and 8 gigs on my laptop...and i get more lag on xbox then pc so try some of the things i said and see what happens
customer_reviews.author: Zack P

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome shooter.
customer_reviews.text: Can't wait till Black Ops II gets cheaper. I seem to wait a year or so after it comes out to get a lower price. Anyway,, the graphics is great and the game play is fun and challenging. I own all the Call of Duty games and loved them all and this is the best one of all, probably due to it being developed at a later time. If you like Call of Duty, this is an excellent addition to your gaming experience.
customer_reviews.author: Jimfl47

customer_reviews.title: EPIC buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great buy! If your a fan of COD back in the day this game is great. the story is EPIC and love playing ZOMBIES on here.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew M.

customer_reviews.title: Single player dud
customer_reviews.text: Single-player mode is lame. Too many cut-scenes that are long and confusing. Gameplay is too "cinematic" and staged. You basically are dragged like through a movie, except you get to aim and pull the trigger. All COD games suffer from that to SOME extent, but this one is way worse than usual.
customer_reviews.author: M. Harvey

customer_reviews.title: product key
customer_reviews.text: I've waited a few days for this product which is fast delivery. I go to download the game and the product key is already registered with an account. Why sell a product that isn't even usable? Sorry for the poor rating but I am not a satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: Dante

customer_reviews.title: Great game, same as the wii
customer_reviews.text: This is a great game. Its extremely well made and composes of the following three game modes. Zombies, multiplayer, and story mode. All of these features are extremely well made and fun. This game is the same as wii which i thought it could've been different. Its a great game and i really recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Just an Amaz(ing)on user

customer_reviews.title: Game Makers, give us something new
customer_reviews.text: This will be the last Call of Duty I purchase. I bought all the Call of Duty's before this version as well. Nothing much has changed. Just a few new guns and new bad guys to shoot at. Shorter single player each new version. This game is like the Rocky movies. It was good at first but every sequel gets more lame and boring. And Don't get me started about the Halo Franchise.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonLover

customer_reviews.title: narrow
customer_reviews.text: I'd read in reviews, but I didn't understand till I played. The campaign is so narrow; many times you are just watching a video until you press one button at the right time. I've gotten stuck at a level where I can't seem to figure out the right place to stand to follow the script. All the new weapons are cool, and the multiplayer works well for me.
customer_reviews.author: CrustyDog

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: As advertised and works very well, throwing it up on my large tv screen!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rev

customer_reviews.title: IF YOU HAVE PROBLEMS WITH YOUR SYSTEM LOADING IT YOU ARE STUCK WITH THE USELESS CRAP.
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY IT. IF YOU HAVE PROBLEMS WITH YOUR SYSTEM LOADING IT YOU ARE STUCK WITH THE USELESS CRAP.
customer_reviews.author: walter sivigny

customer_reviews.title: Russian acid trip
customer_reviews.text: This game is a $50 bad acid trip and as tedius as a Russian novel. Quite a lot of story and what small parts of 1st person shooter exist are short, basic, and often interrupted by quasi 1st person where you may be able to control direction of travel but nothing else. Not fun, not challenging, not worth $20 much less sticker price.
customer_reviews.author: Mulepick

customer_reviews.title: Call Of Duty Black Ops...Don't buy this game! Warning!
customer_reviews.text: Please don't waste your money on this game. It is barely playable, if at all. My computer has a better video card than needed and it still lags terribly. The screen freezes constantly and lags everytime I shoot a bullet. I don't know how the other systems are working with the game, but for the PC, it's horrible!
customer_reviews.author: My Two Cents

customer_reviews.title: Software never launches successfully.
customer_reviews.text: The software was installed, with difficulty, by my system admin. Yet, we were unable to run it - on two different systems. Software never starts, no error, it just crashes before it even launches. Very poor consumer experience. No interest to resolve it, just want my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Mr V Joseph

customer_reviews.title: didn't work, don't buy used, code is used ...
customer_reviews.text: didn't work, don't buy used, code is used so it is already owned by previous person and you will not able to play.
customer_reviews.author: F1KR3T

customer_reviews.title: Would probably be fun if it worked.
customer_reviews.text: The multiplayer doesn't work right on PC. Many people are reporting performance problems, and I am no exception. The game stutters horribly in multiplayer to the point where I haven't been able to play the game. Look on youtube for examples of the performance problems in this game, where the game completely hangs up on a regular basis. Single player worked to a satisfactory level, and there are some good set-pieces, but I bought the game for the multiplayer, and I'm disappointed that I haven't been able to play on PC. I would recommend people purchase the game for Xbox 360 if they have the option, or wait until a patch comes along that fixes the horrendous performance problems.
customer_reviews.author: Mushi

customer_reviews.title: Fun game
customer_reviews.text: Cool game in single player. Even better in multiplayer online mode. Always good to buy a title when a sequel is about to be released. Picked this copy up for $25, a little less than half the original price. Will be doing the same with COD Black Ops 2 when the next COD comes out. Lol, $50 for a game? Nope.
customer_reviews.author: James M.

customer_reviews.title: a pretty good game
customer_reviews.text: This game is a lot of fun online and is even more fun when playing combat training or zombies. Really though the main reason for why I bought it was for the zombies and let me tell you that the zombies game mode is amazing. The only draw back I didn't like to much was that the producers of the game, Treyarch, said that they are not going to release the ability to make your own custom zombies which bummed me out a little because this game has so much potential. That is why I gave it a rating of four stars instead of five.
customer_reviews.author: pc person

customer_reviews.title: CoD: BO PC Disk Great
customer_reviews.text: Okay, the game doesn't exactly run the best on my PC, but it runs, and the game itself is fun, the game was sent to me on time, nothing open, and it was fine... the only problem I had was when I loaded it up on my PC for the first time... the game didn't want to load but that was just my disk drive... lucky me I had a Steam code from the back of the case so, yeah I was still able to get it!
customer_reviews.author: Vera Zoey

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: i cant belive the graphics look way better than it did on the pc. i dont know why people are complaining about graphics being bad, i got a 2009 asus gamming laptop, the cheapest on they sold back then i might add and it handles it with ease.
customer_reviews.author: the kidd

customer_reviews.title: Had fun, that's what counts
customer_reviews.text: I know how CoD is getting repetitive, but this game was still fun. It introduced enough new concepts to have fun: theater mode, enhanced zombie mode, wager matches, great maps, better attachments, better perk combos and perk pros, currency system, etc. Sniping was still fun. Hate the full game price though.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Huang

customer_reviews.title: Serious Long Known PC Issues
customer_reviews.text: Well great game but I would like a refund as this game has a long known PC version issue where it continually freezes and goes to desktop that apparently was never resolved in any patch. It looked and ran great otherwise but from my research this issue has been around since launch and was never fixed. Hoping to get Black Ops 2 with the issue resolved. Great game but not on PC (even though it looks 10x better on PC). Hope this helps someone.
customer_reviews.author: DMC

customer_reviews.title: Very Fun
customer_reviews.text: I never was a huge fan of first person shooters, more of an RPG type gamer, but this was an awsome buy. Downloading is way better than hard copies. Storyline was fun and interesting and the encounters were challenging and required tactical progression. (Hard) . Action action action.
customer_reviews.author: Paul M.

customer_reviews.title: Could not register
customer_reviews.text: The do not tell you that the serial number registration is a crap shoot.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is now a happy camper! He likes playing Call of Duty: Black Ops. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby H

customer_reviews.title: Horrible PC Optimization. DO NOT BUY! 0 Stars? I Wish!
customer_reviews.text: I have 150+ hours in Black Ops 2 but I cannot get Black Ops to run smoothly no matter what I try. I've spent hours in google, on BO and other games forums and tweaked every setting possible and nothing seems to work. As it turns out, I'm not the only one. Many PC users with newer and older computers cannot run this game smoothly. If you're one of the lucky few it might work for you, but just avoid it and don't bother wasting your money. 0/5 - DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Call of Duty: Black Ops
customer_reviews.text: A very interesting follow-up to the Call of Duty series. The graphics and program load time is a drag, especially compared to the previous Call of Duty games. Haven't tried the "Zombie" option yet. I would buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: JJB

customer_reviews.title: Action Packed
customer_reviews.text: Fun game. Lots of action. Good graphics. Not for little children.
customer_reviews.author: Myra

customer_reviews.title: Does not Work..Left my Hd5870 Gaming Machine Choking.....So bad I returned it.
customer_reviews.text: Machine:Core 2 Duo 2.93 4gb Ram Hd5870..Latest ATi Drivers...with services Tweaked and tuned off for optimal Gaming performance. "BlackViper Style" [..] This Pc game Sputters and Chokes and is brought to it knees in both online and in standard Mode. Do Not Buy PC Version. I pre-ordered and will not again. I really have to Buy Xbox and rent before buying...thats what the smart people do.. currently 145+ 1 stars reviews That in its self should Tell you not to waste your Money. ... ReadMore:[...] [...]
customer_reviews.author: Up North Live

customer_reviews.title: COOL GAME
customer_reviews.text: Very nice game - good graphics and nice action - works well on my PC (AMD Athlon X2 II 3.2 - 4gb RAM - AMD/ATI 1gb video card) no issues whatsoever. Everything runs smooth and fast. Given other reviews, I was very hesitant but, decided to 'risk' it anyway. As it turns out, couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: GP

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Run of the Mill
customer_reviews.text: Typical first person shooter. Very little storyline. Actually too much continuous action tends to make it boring at times. Graphics were decent. I think this genre is getting so repetitive it's no longer fun to play.
customer_reviews.author: amazonbuyer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. You will definitely want to use a console controller
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: A new take on an old game
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy playing this game very much. I have played an older version before and the graphics were much better on the second one. The zombies portion of the game doesn't have all the unnecessary extras that the old version had, which I like. I also prefer the older style weapons.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: COH Black Ops
customer_reviews.text: i'm about a third of the way through this game and it is great. Perhaps it was patched, I don't know. The game plays great, tha action is non stop and the graphics are excellent. Great buy. I hope COH BL Ops 2 is just as good. I purchased this game through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: J T.

customer_reviews.title: Great Game!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this game to go along with my other Call of Duty titles. Great game with wonderful storyline. Excellent graphics and awesome multiplayer. If you enjoy first person shooters this is excellent. Goes right along with the Call of Duty Series!
customer_reviews.author: J. Harrell

customer_reviews.title: Fun game for my bootcamp mac
customer_reviews.text: I got this game so I could play multi player with others in my house. I installed it on my windows 7 boot camp side of my 2009 17" mac book pro. It runs the game well on lower settings. I like the ability to play combat training with all computer players.
customer_reviews.author: Weather Nut

customer_reviews.title: Wasted Money
customer_reviews.text: Save your money and avoid this poor excuse for a game. I've had trouble loading it and launching it. I have an alienware computer that will run anything, never had so much difficulty with a game before. The game finally opened and it's very choppy, I have know idea why, but I'm very disappointed. I feel bad for all the people throwing away their money on this piece of trash right before Christmas. One last thing, I agree with another post, this diserves 0 stars but that's not an option.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Evans

customer_reviews.title: A great game if you have the stuff
customer_reviews.text: With all the hype I could,nt wait to play this. When I got it I had all kinds of problems with frame rates and all that graphic stuff, even though I had all the requirements. The new steam patches did help and I was able to finish single player on low graphic settings. If you are going to buy this game make sure you have all the updated requirements from the Steam sight for your PC such as tri core processors and proper video cards. If you do you will love this game. I have all the medal of honor series and call of duty games and this is the best game play by far.
customer_reviews.author: TOM BENAWAY

customer_reviews.title: Garbage Support
customer_reviews.text: Horrible updates for the PC. I can play tons of other modern games like Crysis 2, Tomb Raider, and Witcher 2 with great framerates. This thing for some reason just isn't optimized with my setup.
customer_reviews.author: Hai Do

customer_reviews.title: It's a little inconvenient for me but pandabooks1978 was very convenient and made the best out of a bad situation
customer_reviews.text: code didn't work but user selling the product responded very fast and is giving me a refund. It's a little inconvenient for me but pandabooks1978 was very convenient and made the best out of a bad situation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just a fair warning to those who don't know: ...
customer_reviews.text: Just a fair warning to those who don't know: Be careful from where you buy this game! This is twice I ordered it and twice the seller sent me the game without a working key. No disrespect intended to the sellers.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's the Call Of Duty series!!..How can you go wrong??...

customer_reviews.text: game did not work, codes had already been used. I did get a full refund, but it was still disappointing.

customer_reviews.title: He is happy with the game
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for a friend, who was replacing games for his laptop. He is happy with the game.
customer_reviews.author: CoeDean

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great product and am completely satisfied. No issues whatsoever. Will recommend to anyone interested in this product. Will do business again with.

customer_reviews.title: LACKING
customer_reviews.text: This is a"dog" in the COD series. I own all of the COD series and much prefer playing them than playing this one. The graphic are ok but it is lacking in substance for single players, it is loaded with online multiplayer missions. I preorded the game 3 months ago for $59.99, but if I knew what I know now I would have waited and bought it later at a reduced price..
customer_reviews.author: Vickki L. Howell

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BE SUCKERED INTO BUYING THIS GAME USED !
customer_reviews.text: I cannot review this game on game play, as I have not been able to play it yet. Buyer beware, you cannot use this game if it is used. The steam account will not accept the cd key again if it has been used once prior. Buy the game new and avoid having to return it as I have to do.
customer_reviews.author: msclvr

customer_reviews.title: Great game!
customer_reviews.text: If you love first person shooter games, you will probably enjoy this game. I've played all of the Medal of Honor and Call of Duty games from the very beginning. I love both games. I can be entertained for many hours playing by myself or playing online.

customer_reviews.title: go Nuts
customer_reviews.text: I think game has far to much time on the brainwashing than on fighting. Overall, it was a fun game to play..

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great game. Speedy shipment. Great transaction and Highly recommended!!!! Thanks

customer_reviews.title: Good Game
customer_reviews.text: I originally had the game for the 360, but I switched to PC gaming alittle while ago and so I made the trade. I knew how to play, so it was fun. Rate 5/5 stars yo;D

customer_reviews.title: I bought this Game and Got it I was happy it came
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Game and Got it I was happy it came. I opend it up the code didn't work so GENEL sent me a brand new one! I would give them 2000000000 out of 10 Thank you so much for the service!

customer_reviews.title: CALL OF DUTY - BLACK OPS
customer_reviews.text: Still can't play the game! Beware don't buy! I can't get my game registered because the company that I need to register this product with in order to play it has been down on and off since Christmas Day and they don't return any email questions except for sending out the standard reply that they will get back to you when they have a chance! Waste of money! They shouldn't sell the product if they are not able to accommodate the amount of traffic they are experiencing. Big let down :(
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl C Amaral

customer_reviews.title: GREAT! but know this...
customer_reviews.text: Great game but one thing you need to be aware of... COD BO1 isn't very optimized for pc so you need to tweak the game files to fix the FPS problem where it will lag-spike even on the highest end of hardware, but overall this is a very good game and i recommend this to anyone that loves the COD franchise. Peace. ~Alex

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Call of Duty has been more than what I had expected. I would recommend this game to anyone who is interested in a complete game.

customer_reviews.text: Just another COD game. Story is predictable and too easy ! Not much thinking involved, just shoot at everything that moves ! More unreal ! My game crashed 2 levels before final !

customer_reviews.text: Every year I waited and purchase the latest COD game after the Christmas to save $10. I love this one for the Nam actions.

customer_reviews.text: screw the haters!! this game is awesome and i highly recommend it!

customer_reviews.title: Great Game, Just Few Players on PC...
customer_reviews.text: I love Black Ops. It's a great game no matter what platform you play it on. Only thing I have to say against it is, very few active servers on PC...

customer_reviews.title: would recommend several other games first
customer_reviews.text: ok game - probably worth the $8 i paid. would recommend several other games first...
customer_reviews.author: Pete Moss

customer_reviews.title: its a game!!
customer_reviews.text: Had to order the game twice, I bought a used copy first to find out that the product key code was invalid, now with the second copy I get serious lag, probably a computer issue with that, but the game works fine, and is just the same as you would play on any game system that you can play this game on.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: What??
customer_reviews.text: This game doesn't work at all. I have and Intel i5 processor and 8 GB RAM, and no matter what graphics settings I use, the game goes to a black screen for about 2 seconds every 5 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: JZ

customer_reviews.title: Good addition to the CoD series
customer_reviews.text: Good game... if you like shooters... not really all that different from the others in the series but fun none-the-less.
customer_reviews.author: KMMR

customer_reviews.title: Should not of been sold used, not able to use because of steam verification limits
customer_reviews.text: I was not able to use the product because the CD Key was previously registered with steam online account and the key can only be associated with one account therefor you can not sell and use this software second hand. I was not aware of this when I purchased the product so I have an unusable product thanks to the Publisher..........
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: really cool
customer_reviews.text: awesome story and game play. Just don't understand the silly mini zombies game also included. Just played the main solo game.
customer_reviews.author: G. Dias

customer_reviews.title: Very difficult to find "normal" multiplayer servers.
customer_reviews.text: It's tough to find multiplayer servers with "normal" rules that have players on them. Unfortunately there are no "official" multiplayer servers online anymore for this game, so you're forced to play on hosted servers and most have idiotic criteria like "hardcore crouch-only" or similar rules that prohibit, and then ban you, from playing the game the way you want. I also get auto-banned and perma-banned from servers for swearing (not racist/defamatory) in the chat, which ticks me off because the game is rated M (17+).
customer_reviews.author: Tom G.

customer_reviews.title: Non stop action
customer_reviews.text: Great game, great graphics. I had a little trouble jumping from one building to the next but once I got the hang of it,I couldn't stop playing. Great variety in weapons, venues and fighting scenarios.
customer_reviews.author: Weekend Warrior

customer_reviews.title: good shooter game
customer_reviews.text: good story line, good graphics, easy to set controls, steam is better than origin but thats my opinion. good price well worth it
customer_reviews.author: Erieka Raber

customer_reviews.title: Can't understand all of the hoopla
customer_reviews.text: Certainly a good to very good shooter. Not impressed with the storyline; a little overplayed dramatics. Not the best COD IMHO.
customer_reviews.author: Abacus

customer_reviews.title: An excellent FPS Campaign
customer_reviews.text: I played this to the end. Very nice and relatively easy FPS for me. Thoroughly enjoyed the ten hours or so to complete.
customer_reviews.author: William S. Whitley

customer_reviews.title: . Like it a lot.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice game to play with a lot of challenges and excitement. Excellent quality like playing in a real movie with good entertainment.
customer_reviews.author: hector

customer_reviews.title: black ops cinemas
customer_reviews.text: Black ops is almost great,the missions was enjoyable to play BUT having to wate for the long a33 cinemas to play out took most of the fun out of the game.haveing to sit through cod2 cinemas gave me an idea.time both the cinemas and actuly game play time.half my time was wasted on you guessed it cinemas,I understand why pirates never pay for something like this.why can't we click past the cinema parts like in half-life so we can just play.If i wanted to watch a cinema I could go to youtube for free,this wast of money should be called call of duty cinema.guess where I will get my next game from "tpb"
customer_reviews.author: Ron Crowell

customer_reviews.title: Another great game
customer_reviews.text: Great game. Gotta do something with STEAM though. To me it is simple. I buy a game, I put it into my PC and I play the game.... Not with STEAM.. You buy the game, you put it into your PC, it loads stuff.. Then you have to down load the game on STEAM. This game took over 24 hours to download. Granted my internet speed is not all that, but I think there should be a better way to play without STEAM involved.
customer_reviews.author: Hanns

customer_reviews.title: Arcade Game
customer_reviews.text: Call of Duty was very Arcade like, run shoot and don't get shot too much. Atmosphere was juvenile, but for an arcade game it was fun. I prefer the strategy games like the Ghost Recon series, where there you control squad based strategy and a more realistic feel. I didn't try the online game, got bored easily with this one. Oh did I mention I get sick of the vehicle driving, way too contrived, especially the helos.
customer_reviews.author: Grog

customer_reviews.title: For the most part was great
customer_reviews.text: Outside of the usual hangs, which for me wasn't many, it was a decent game to play. Like all of the FPS it still has worth in playing.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Lee

customer_reviews.title: Zombies
customer_reviews.text: Playing online is annoying (typical hackers, modders, ect) storyline is boring and reminds me of every other war game. But Zombies is addicting. I don't like the fact you have to pay extra for a descent Zombie map.
customer_reviews.author: Serfirio

customer_reviews.title: couldnt even play it
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT get this game pre-owned wast of money. tried to play is but the code was already taken! 💘
customer_reviews.author: allen

customer_reviews.title: Great Price
customer_reviews.text: This game is better than Black Ops 2. I purchased this game for a few friends and we have our own server.
customer_reviews.author: Maxx

customer_reviews.title: Code I got doesn’t even work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this game just to have the code be invalid I can’t even play the game at all
customer_reviews.author: Zachary P.

product_meta.title: Call of Duty: Black Ops - PC
product_meta.description:
Platform:PC| Edition:StandardThe newest installment in the biggest action series of all time and the follow up to last year's blockbuster Modern Warfare 2, Call of Duty: Black Ops launches on November 9, 2010.

AMAZON.COM


Call of Duty: Black Ops is a first-person shooter with stealth and tactical play aspect that puts players in the role of a shadow soldier fighting in a variety of historically representative fictional Black Ops missions of the Cold War era. Created with the input of actual Black Ops soldiers from the time, the game mixes traditional Call of Duty tactical shooter gameplay with new gameplay options designed to expand the players' experience. Additional features include extensive multiplayer options, along with new vehicles and explosive new weapons.  

Putting Out the Hotspots of the Cold War
Follow-up to 2009’s blockbuster Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2, Call of Duty: Black Ops breaks new ground in the Call of Duty series and the video game industry at large by delving into the not-so cold conflicts of the Cold War.

 


Relive the Cold War COD style.
View larger. Inspired by the experiences of real Black Ops soldiers of the era, the missions of Call of Duty: Black Ops take the player to a wide variety of settings, ranging from snowbound mountain strongholds in historical Soviet held territories, to the jungles and urban settings of Vietnam War era SE Asia. Throughout all, care has been taken to maintain the traditional essence of Call of Duty style combat, while also introducing new types of player action that add to the gameplay experience. Additional features include co-op, versus and team-based multiplayer options, new vehicles like the SR-71 Blackbird and lethal new weapons such as explosive-tipped crossbows.

Key Game Features

 * Seventh installment of the Call of Duty series, based on the live fire conflicts of the Cold War era.
 * Diverse variety of play setting ranging from urban air and ground combat in SE Asia, to snow combat in Soviet region and jungle combat.
 * Blending of traditional COD, and new first-person character scenarios designed to both retain the essence of the COD gaming experience and ensure constantly flowing and varied action.
 * New arsenal of weapons and vehicles tied to the Cold War era, including the SR-71 Blackbird and sited explosive-tipped crossbows.
 * Wide array of play modes including single player, local multiplayer versus and online co-op and multiplayer.

3-D Game Features
 * Fully playable in stereoscopic 3D: the game will be compatible with 3D-ready HDTVs and 3D PCs utilizing state-of-the-art active shutter 3D glasses, delivering true depth of field and an unprecedented level of immersion that is perfectly suited for the Call of Duty action experience.
 * Awesome 3D experiences: aim down the sights of your weapons, fly in helicopters, rappel down mountains, move through highly detailed environments and more.
 * The experience is seamless to use with a simple menu option to enable stereoscopic 3D or disable it at any time whether playing in the single player campaign, multiplayer or Zombie mode.
 * Playable in both 3D and non-3D on the Xbox 360, PlayStation 3 and PC. Call of Duty: Black Ops for Windows PC is NVIDIA(R) 3D Vision(R)-Ready and supports stereoscopic 3D gaming using 3D Vision active-shutter glasses and NVIDIA GeForce GPUs. For Xbox 360 and PlayStation 3 system consoles, 3D features require a compatible 3D-ready HD TV. 

Additional Screenshots:

View larger.

View larger.

View larger.

View larger.
